title: These people.....(pointless post)
body:
So I made another account because I wanted to get away from the toxicity of the level 30 oce scene for a couple of games.

First game I get told by ahri that I'm a noob because I have boots and Leona doesn't need boots because shes a tank. Then get told I'm a noob because i have less kills than her.... then I explained the concept of supporting and that if I have a lot of kills I'm really not doing my job properly. No apparently it's because I'm a noob and shit. LOL

Then I was like kat you really shouldn't go mid with brand he called it and in pvp duo mid just isn't done. To which she reply's I'm a noob and i need to think outside of the box because "people will never expect it".

Tried explaining the meta and how it doesn't happen and I just get abused.

Is this the next generation of league players? 

The arguments were so frustratingly nonsensical that it actually annoyed me but at the same time I was amused because of how mind bogglingly retarded they were with ZERO concept of how this game works.

I'm lost for words. Level 30 players can be cunts but at least they know what they are doing lol

I know this is a bit of a pointless post but it was just so weird\annoying\amusing. Anyone at low levels experience this kind of stuff?

replies.body:
If you rigidly follow the meta without questioning why you are a sheep.

If you've tried to break it and failed you have a reason to follow it.

These players are new to the game and learning how it works by doing it wrong.

It's the best way to learn, don't try to tell them what to do.

I have a friend who just reached lvl 30 who says this to his jungler when he ganks
"%%%% off this is my lane I'm SOLO TOP don't come in and try to ks me"
so i think its everywhere haha

>Then I was like kat you really shouldn't go mid with brand he called it and in pvp duo mid just isn't done.

I laughed, you're one of the people that enforce "I called it first, it's mine" when really the chat can be different for everyone as its done by ping, regardless judging from this you're worse than them, stop trying to enforce the meta.

I know it can change and it's dependent on matchup. But when does duo mid happen man? Don't try and paint me to be the villain here. 

Rigidly enforcing the meta is not trying to advise someone so that they won't get screamed at in a real game. Although it is copping heaps of abuse so I guess I was with that one -_-

Dude, low levels are abusive because (bad parenting my play part) firstly they have probably duoed with some lvl 30 who was as bad as them and believe that the way they did it is the correct way in time they will learn,  secondly we are more experienced than them and human nature is to go against what we're told just mute them and accept the fact that they're literally bad

I've found this on my extra accounts, however we just gonna have to deal with it, they will learn the hard way

and yes more %%%%s will join our ranks and we will have more trolls, so switch games to something else for a little while and come back another time, if you don't want to deal with their %%%%ness
Yes i'm off to play dragon age for a month. Have fun all :-D

Sounds like you're taking offense from kids that are probably 10-14 years old and are playing their 20th game of normals... 

Pro tip: Trying to help people on the OCE server almost always ends up with you copping a report because bad players can't handle criticism or advice from someone better so don't bother.
hey i like to take a  advice any time  off people ...

I was honestly trying to help the KAT so she didn't get yelled at when she went into pvp and tried to duo mid.

As for the ahri she was just being horrible for no reason. But what she was saying was completely nonsensical. 

I'm all for %%%%ing with the meta but you know its there in part for a reason. You are also right about them learning for themselves but I wasn't telling them what to do.... mainly just defending against a tirade of insults with fact.
